channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kodak warns investors it might not be around much longer
item.description: A plan to use excess funds from to the end of a pension plan to pay down debt and remain afloat is “progressing as planned,” the company said.

item.title: Why your stock portfolio may actually ‘feel’ depressed that summer is almost over
item.description: Halloween merchandise and pumpkin-spice lattes in August are reminders that winter is coming.

item.title: The tech sector hasn’t been this top-heavy in decades. That could be an opportunity for investors hunting for bargains.
item.description: Software stocks are struggling while semiconductor names soar, creating a divergence within the high-flying tech sector

item.title: Intel’s stock is rising as Trump suggests a path forward after CEO’s White House visit
item.description: Tensions seem to be easing between Intel’s Lip-Bu Tan and Trump, who days ago called for the CEO’s firing but now praises for his “amazing” success st...

item.title: Alphabet, Meta, Amazon and Microsoft share this one thing — and it’ll keep the stocks fired up
item.description: To anyone still shouting “bubble”: Please sit down.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
